title: Lost Lp
body: My league client crashed in a ranked game's champ select and I lost 3 lp, is there any way to get it back??

replies.body:
Ouch, sorry to hear your client crashed. Unfortunately, we're unable to modify your LP for any reason, as the system was designed this way to prevent abuse.

If you have any other crashes or need help with anything else, let me know.
